definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Polarization of shear-wave is analysed by using particle motion diagram.
sentences.chinese: 用質點運動圖的方法對橫波的偏振進行了分析。

sentences.english: A scalar wave tends to propagate as a transverse wave or a standing wave.
sentences.chinese: 分級梯狀波往往是以橫波或駐波傳播。

sentences.english: Therefore, t he porosity obtained from S-wave should be used cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 因此，由橫波求出的孔隙度應慎重使用。

sentences.english: The velocity of the latter is closely related to that of the shear wave.
sentences.chinese: 彎曲波模式的速度和橫波速度近似相關。

definition: Milky Way/also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
